We will attend to any minor dents or scratches to the exterior of the vehicle should there be any. A full interior valet & exterior polish is performed on each of our pre-owned vehicles at point of sale. Extended Service Plans & Warranties are available as an optional extra and can be bolted on to your finance. A variety of finance options available, tailor made to suite your pocket. Trade Ins are welcome! **Service & Delivery Fee not included in the advertised price.
